channel.title: Login/Client Error (Continued)
channel.description:
For some reason, I started my server and logged in. Then, I was in for about a second and I automatically logged out. It showed this error message in the client: [code]Error: T2 - 53,126,126 - 2488,3200,3376 - 21,6,3,32,1,114,6,2,-80,5,3,-122,3,5,43,25,1,92,6,1,51,3,1,-49,2,1,-42,9,1,3,11,1,-72,1,1,-84,9,1,31,5,1,-78,1,1,94,23,1,95,23,-1,. [/code]. If someone can help me out, that would be awesome.
It still doesn't work, and now I get this error in my command prompt: [code]Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3517 Client type: low memory version UserId: 40062671 nets is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15514) at client.process(client.java:15498) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) AncientScape [fatal] - exception Game saved for player nets ClientHandler: Client nets disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from sugardaddy.dreamhost.com:53795 [/code]
I think it might have to do with a new update I was trying to do with player bank size. If someone can verify for me if the following code is good, that would be great: [code] public int playerBankSize = 800; public int[] bankItems = new int[800]; public int[] bankItemsN = new int[800]; public boolean bankNotes = false;[/code]
[b][i][u][color=red][font=Verdana][size=50pt]IF SOMEONE CAN HELP ME OUT THEY WILL GET A REWARD[/size][/font][/u][/i]

item.title: Login/Client Error (Continued)
item.dc:creator: @Billys_Java Billys Java
item.description:
@Billys_Java wrote:

it has everything to do with the bank size i tried changing it before and i got a weird error but i dont remember what it said it might be the same as yours. Just change it back i guess and you will stop getting the error

Read full topic

item.title: Login/Client Error (Continued)
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

[quote=“Nets8, post:1, topic:36474”] For some reason, I started my server and logged in. Then, I was in for about a second and I automatically logged out. It showed this error message in the client: Error: T2 - 53,126,126 - 2488,3200,3376 - 21,6,3,32,1,114,6,2,-80,5,3,-122,3,5,43,25,1,92,6,1,51,3,1,-49,2,1,-42,9,1,3,11,1,-72,1,1,-84,9,1,31,5,1,-78,1,1,94,23,1,95,23,-1,. . If someone can help me out, that would be awesome.

It still doesn’t work, and now I get this error in my command prompt: Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3517 Client type: low memory version UserId: 40062671 nets is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15514) at client.process(client.java:15498) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) AncientScape [fatal] - exception Game saved for player nets ClientHandler: Client nets disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from sugardaddy.dreamhost.com:53795

I think it might have to do with a new update I was trying to do with player bank size. If someone can verify for me if the following code is good, that would be great: public int playerBankSize = 800; public int[] bankItems = new int[800]; public int[] bankItemsN = new int[800]; public boolean bankNotes = false;

[b][color=red][font=Verdana][size=50pt]IF SOMEONE CAN HELP ME OUT THEY WILL GET A REWARD[/size][/font][/quote]
just restart your server lol…
